books.author: Frank Herbert
books.description: Follow the epic journey of Paul Atreides as he navigates the treacherous politics of Arrakis and the power of spice.
books.title: Dune

books.author: Orson Scott Card
books.description: Join Ender Wiggin in his journey to save humanity in a world threatened by an alien species.
books.title: Ender's Game

books.author: William Gibson
books.description: Enter the cyberpunk world of Case, a washed-up hacker, as he uncovers the secrets of an AI and a powerful drug known as 'Neuromancer.'
books.title: Neuromancer

books.author: Suzanne Collins
books.description: In a dystopian society, Katniss Everdeen must fight for her life in the Hunger Games, a televised battle to the death.
books.title: The Hunger Games

books.author: Isaac Asimov
books.description: Join Hari Seldon as he predicts the fall of the Galactic Empire and strives to preserve knowledge in the face of a dark age.
books.title: Foundation

books.author: Aldous Huxley
books.description: In a future society engineered for stability, Bernard Marx and Lenina Crowne discover the price of conformity and the loss of individuality.
books.title: Brave New World

books.author: George Orwell
books.description: Winston Smith rebels against the oppressive regime of Big Brother in a bleak, surveillance-driven future.

books.author: Neal Stephenson
books.description: Hiro Protagonist, a hacker and pizza delivery driver, is drawn into a world of virtual reality, corporate espionage, and the enigmatic drug Snow Crash.
books.title: Snow Crash

books.author: Ursula K. Le Guin
books.description: Join Genly Ai, an ambassador on a mission to a planet inhabited by androgynous beings, as he navigates cultural and political complexities.
books.title: The Left Hand of Darkness

books.author: Andy Weir
books.description: Astronaut Mark Watney is left stranded on Mars and must use his ingenuity and scientific skills to survive until rescue is possible.
books.title: The Martian

books.author: Richard K. Morgan
books.description: In a world where consciousness can be transferred between bodies, Takeshi Kovacs, a former soldier, investigates a wealthy man's murder.
books.title: Altered Carbon

books.author: James S.A. Corey
books.description: Join Detective Miller and Captain Holden as they uncover a conspiracy that threatens humanity in a colonized solar system.
books.title: The Expanse: Leviathan Wakes

books.author: Philip K. Dick
books.description: Rick Deckard, a bounty hunter, is tasked with hunting down and 'retiring' rogue androids in a dystopian future.
books.title: Do Androids Dream of Electric Sheep?

books.author: Arthur C. Clarke
books.description: A mysterious monolith is discovered on the moon, leading humanity on a journey to the outer reaches of the solar system and beyond.
books.title: 2001: A Space Odyssey

books.author: H.G. Wells
books.description: Witness the invasion of Earth by Martians and the struggle for survival in this classic science fiction novel.
books.title: The War of the Worlds

books.author: Octavia E. Butler
books.description: Lauren Olamina, a young woman with hyperempathy, navigates a post-apocalyptic America while founding a new religion.
books.title: Parable of the Sower

books.author: Mary Shelley
books.description: Victor Frankenstein, a young scientist, creates a grotesque creature in a daring experiment, leading to tragic consequences.
books.title: Frankenstein

books.author: Ray Bradbury
books.description: Experience a future society where books are banned, and firemen burn any that are found.
books.title: Fahrenheit 451

books.author: Margaret Atwood
books.description: In a patriarchal society of the future, women are subjugated and valued only for their ability to bear children.
books.title: The Handmaid's Tale

books.author: Dan Simmons
books.description: A group of scientists embarks on an expedition to a remote planet to study an ancient alien artifact, but they discover something far more sinister.
books.title: Hyperion
